products.name: Adidas Ultraboost 21
products.description: The Adidas Ultraboost 21 is a comfortable and responsive shoe, designed for running and training. It features Boost cushioning technology and a Primeknit upper for a snug fit.

products.name: Adidas Stan Smith
products.description: The Adidas Stan Smith is a classic and timeless shoe, known for its simple design and clean lines. It features a leather upper and a rubber outsole.

products.name: Adidas NMD_R1
products.description: The Adidas NMD_R1 is a stylish and versatile shoe, designed for everyday wear. It features a knit upper and Boost cushioning for comfort and support.

products.name: Adidas Adilette Cloudfoam Plus
products.description: The Adidas Adilette Cloudfoam Plus is a comfortable and lightweight slide, perfect for after a workout or for casual wear. It features a Cloudfoam Plus footbed for a plush feel.

products.name: Adidas Ultraboost DNA CC
products.description: The Adidas Ultraboost DNA CC is a lightweight and breathable shoe, designed for running and training in warm weather. It features a Primeknit upper and a Continental rubber outsole.

products.name: Adidas Superstar
products.description: The Adidas Superstar is a classic and iconic shoe, known for its distinctive shell toe and three stripes. It features a leather upper and a rubber outsole.

products.name: Adidas Adizero Boston 10
products.description: The Adidas Adizero Boston 10 is a lightweight and responsive shoe, designed for fast-paced runs and races. It features a Boost midsole and a breathable mesh upper.
